description: Vanessa Springora has given an account of the traumatic effects of her relationship with a writer.
title: When sexual abuse was called seduction: France confronts its past
title_page: When sexual abuse was called seduction: France confronts its past - BBC News
maintext: And yet just a generation ago, evidently, the idea of sex between adult men and adolescent girls was not only not shocking - in "enlightened" circles, that is. More than that, it was seen as liberating for the youngsters themselves - a final casting off of the sexual bonds imposed by the old pre-1968 order.
